mapper.select: select branch.*, me_id as 'br_admin' from branch join member on me_name = br_name;
mapper.insert: insert into branch(br_name, br_phone, br_address) values(#{br.br_name}, #{br.br_phone}, #{br.br_address});

insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_name, me_phone, me_address, me_birth, me_authority) values(#{me.me_id}, #{me.me_pw}, #{me.me_email}, #{me.me_name}, #{me.me_phone}, #{me.me_address}, current_timestamp(), "BRADMIN")
mapper.select: select * from member join branch on me_name = br_name where me_name = #{br.br_name};
